name: Iot
tagline: A simple, embedded operating system written in C/C++.
body:
### Welcome to IOT System!
A simple operating system for embedded systems that run on the Intel x86 architecture

### Pre-Build
Follow the instructions on osdev.org for cross compilation.

### Build
Just type ./run.sh.

### Authors and Contributors
In 2015, @nbsoftwarecsjava created IOT System.

### Support or Contact
If you have trouble compiling or running IOT System, contact me at nbsoftwarecsjava@outlook.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
